# Load Libraries

```{r}
library(viridis)
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Load Data

```{r}
q1_3 = read_excel(
  './data/Q1_3.xlsx', 
  range = 'A7:K402',
  col_names = colnames(
    read_excel('./data/Q1_3.xlsx', n_max = 1)
    )
) |>
  rename_with(~tolower(.)) |>
  rename(median = `even chance`) |>
  rename_with(~ str_split(.x, ' ', simplify = TRUE)[,3], .cols = matches('level'))
```

## Data Cleaning

```{r}
q1_3 = q1_3 |>
  mutate(
    across(.cols = c(lower, upper, median), ~ as.numeric(.x))
    )
```

```{r}
ggplot(q1_3, 
       aes(x = lower,
           color = scenario)) +
  geom_density() +
  facet_grid(question ~ category, scales = 'free')
```
